message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it's worth a lot to the right person. I'm happy to offer it to you for $150. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I believe I can offer you a fair price of $130. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest.  $130 is a little low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $140? I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am willing to go up to $135 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
